member.name: M:AllCompaniesAPI.Controllers.CompanyController.GetAllCompanies
member.summary: You Can Check All Companies From Here.
member.returns: This endpoint returns a list of Companies With their data.

member.name: M:AllCompaniesAPI.Controllers.CompanyController.GetCompany(System.String)
member.summary: You Can Check Companies From Here one by one with their Codes.
member.returns: this endpoint returns a Company with its data.

member.name: M:AllCompaniesAPI.Controllers.CompanyController.AddCompany(AllCompaniesAPI.Models.Company)
member.summary: You Can Add a New Company From Here With Entering its Parameters.
member.remarks:
All the parameterse except code in the request body can be null.
NOTE: You can only add by one Company at a time.
Sample request:
POST /Company { "code":not null, "url":null, "companyName": null, "city": null, "independentAuditingFirm":null }
member.returns: this endpoint returns a list of Companies

member.name: M:AllCompaniesAPI.Controllers.CompanyController.UpdateCompany(AllCompaniesAPI.Models.Company)
member.summary: You Can Update a existing Company From Here with changing the Parameters.
member.returns: this endpoint returns a list of Companies

member.name: M:AllCompaniesAPI.Controllers.CompanyController.DeleteCompany(System.String)
member.summary: You Can Delete a existing Company From Here with entering its Company Code.
member.returns: this endpoint returns a list of Companies
